abstract.t: On a multi-access network, one of the PIM routers is elected as a Designated Router (DR). On the last hop network, the PIM DR is responsible for tracking local multicast listeners and forwarding traffic to these listeners if the group is operated in PIM SM. In this document, we propose a modification to the PIM SM protocol that allows more than one of these last hop routers to be selected so that the forwarding load can be distributed to and handled among these routers.
